author: Marium Irfan
text:
In case you think screaming at your employees is leadership...

Then you're just an awful boss.

Constructive criticism can be passed by not being rude.

Try pointing out their mistakes in a polite manner and watch their performance sky rocket.

author: Marium Irfan
text:
All boys and all girls is not only sexist but also determemtal in the long term. 

The switch to Co education system in University times is tough for both the genders, but no one will talk about it. 

Because according to extremists "talking to the other gender is Haram"

author: Marium Irfan
text:
Parents shouldn't of force their kids into all boys, all girls education systems
 
Rather they should educate their children on how to differentiate and protect themselves from harm. 

👇
